    • Method Detail

      • fetchByID

        ChallengeRating fetchByID(int id)
        Fetch a challenge rating by its id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the object
        Returns:
        challenge rating with id id or null if none is found

      • fetchLikeName

        java.util.List<ChallengeRating> fetchLikeName(java.lang.String name)
        Fetch a challenge rating by using a likeness check on its name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        challenge ratings which have a name like name (may be empty, not null)

      • fetchByName

        ChallengeRating fetchByName(java.lang.String name)
        Fetch a challenge rating with the specified name using a database equality check. May or may not be case-dependent.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the challenge rating
        Returns:
        a challenge rating with the specified name, or null.
